case_title: MIR HASSAN AND ANOTHER vs DEPUTY REHABILITATION COMMISSIONER, ZHOB AND ANOTHER
respondents: Deputy Rehabilitation Commissioner, Zhob and Mulla Khudai Nazar
laws_referred: Baluchistan Administration of Evacuee Property Regulation I of 1950
key_issues: Transfer of evacuee property under Settlement Scheme No. VII
Applicability of Displaced Persons (Compensation and Rehabilitation) Act, 1958 to Special Areas
Validity of orders passed by Deputy Rehabilitation Commissioner

facts.property_details: Two evacuee Kutcha rural buildings bearing Nos. 30/F and 30/G
facts.petitioners_possession: Petitioners were in possession of the properties.

court_findings.settlement_scheme_applicability: Settlement Scheme No. VII was not extended to Special Areas of Baluchistan.
court_findings.transfer_validity: Transfer of property to Mulla Khudai Nazar under Settlement Scheme No. VII was declared void.
court_findings.ejectment_order_validity: Ejectment order dated 1970-06-01 was declared void as it was based on the invalid transfer.

reliefs_granted: Declaration that the transfer of property to Mulla Khudai Nazar is void.
Declaration that the ejectment order is void.
reliefs_denied: Declaration that the properties stand transferred to the petitioners under Settlement Scheme No. VII.
